descriptionlist.description: This package contains default Apple Live Wallpapers with a reverse effect!
Hold down till the end for full effect! Also this package contains the fish while AppleReversal2 contains the ink!

The reversed wallpapers will be located towards the bottom of the Wallpaper Section of Settings
APPLEREV1.PNG

screenshot.description: Scroll to the bottom to see it!
This is a description for screenshot 2. It's another Cydia!
